item.title: Stats not updating?
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

All my stats wont update when i level up??

my base is delta.

} public void levelup(int i) { char c = '\0'; switch(i) { case 0: changeText126("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level!", 6248); changeText126((new StringBuilder()).append("Your attack level is now ").append(getLevelForXP(playerXP[i])).append(" .").toString(), 6249); sendFrame164(6247); break;
